#summary SurfaceLab 6 Measurement File format

= SurfaceLab 6 Measurement File Format =

SurfaceLab 6 is a surface-analysis software package from [http://www.ion-tof.com ION-TOF].

SurfaceLab 6 uses the extension `.itm` to identify its measurement files. These files are a proprietary format which require SurfaceLab to generate or interpret them.

The internet media type `application/x-iontof-measurement` may be used to classify the files on the internet.
